name: current-datetime
title: Copy Current Date and Time
description: Get current date-time and copy to clipboard
author: mkanenobu

commands.name: yyyy-mm-dd-hh-mm-ss
commands.title: yyyy-mm-dd-hh-mm-ss
commands.description: Get current date-time and copy to clipboard with YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format

commands.name: iso8601
commands.title: iso8601
commands.description: Get current date-time and copy to clipboard with ISO8601 format

commands.name: unixtime
commands.title: unixtime
commands.description: Get current date-time and copy to clipboard with Unixtime format
